name: One Knight to Escape
description:
By Kelli Claridge and Quinn Schwab


Made for Steve's 0 - 40 hour thing jam, September 2016
(http://makeathing.com.au/, https://itch.io/jam/make-a-thing-16-09)
Theme words: Roam | Flaws | L

The enemy is closing in but there is a flaw in their plan - they didn't realise you could jump!
Escape their wall before they lock you in so you can roam free once more!

P.S. The knight moves in L shapes (and flipped L shapes, but we don't discriminate)
